step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel that gentle resistance. Ensure your palm and fingers are open wide for the next step.
Excellent! You're maintaining a good overhead stretch. Now, prepare to make a fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles.
Great job making a fist and tightening your muscles as you inhaled. Remember to open your hand and relax as you exhale.
Well done on opening your hand and relaxing as you exhaled. Visualize the fluid moving. Let's repeat this for the second set.
Second set, starting strong! Continue to stretch your arm straight overhead, feeling the resistance. Keep your palm and fingers open wide.
Good work maintaining the overhead position. Now, inhale and make a tight fist, engaging your muscles.
Nicely done making a fist and tightening your muscles on the inhale. Remember to fully open your hand and relax on the exhale.
Fantastic finish to the second set! You opened your hand and relaxed well on the exhale. Keep up this great form!

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the stretch. Make sure to open your hand wide and then make a tight fist while inhaling, and relax your hand while exhaling.
